text: korotiar bar aghuiba ko, azenan azuir korotiar ruariba ko, saketɨn aghuiba ko, dagɨaba azuir forivtariba ko, guabar garir ganganiba ko, korotiar me nir ghurghurir aghuibar isamiziba ko, dapanir asuaba ko, inir aghuiba. Ekiam bar me dama da adegham.3:22-23 E datɨrɨghɨn deragha fozir puvatɨ, fomɨra ikezir kurkazir kaba, da ti manmaghɨra gari.
